duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expert styling advice and individualized experiences to customers, building authentic connections and enhancing the customer experience.
Inspire and guide the team through creativity, outfitting, and positive leadership, fostering collaboration and driving the store's success.
Maintain a visually compelling, neat, and organized store, supporting store objectives relating to customer service, outfitting, or styling.
Utilize technology to facilitate client transactions, upsell products, and support associate education and brand focuses.
Participate in store communication, fit sessions, and provide store and departmental insight related to the customer experience.
Foster ongoing relationships with clients through outreach, appointment generation, service follow-up, and engagement through store events.

education_certification.credential: Experience in fashion or retail industry
